parameters.functionScript:
let w = Inputs.w
let o = "row"
let withprice = 70
let withtotal = 30
let spacer = true
if(w<400){
    o = "column"
    withprice = 100
    withtotal = 100
    spacer = false
 }

 Outputs.layout = o
 Outputs.wLeft = withprice
 Outputs.wRight = withtotal
 Outputs.spacer = spacer
